PropertyContents.PropertyContent: Free your senses and they will reward you with exhilaration, one thrilling kilometer after another.

The robust design, impressive power and exceptional fuel efficiency of an Infiniti engine delivers an uncommonly smooth and refined performance. Factor in the advanced precision of Variable Valve Event and Lift (VVEL®) technology and the possibilities seem limitless. All it takes is a tap of the accelerator.
Connect fully to your vehicle and bring more out of yourself and your drive.

A potent blend of exciting response andintelligent efficiency. Benefitting from Variable Valve Event andLift (VVEL) technology, the engine adjusts on the fly to makethe most of every bit of fuel and every breath it takes. The resultis a stirring 329 horsepower that still manages to achieve upto 8.7l/100km*.

When you flick the magnesium paddle shifter for alower gear, Downshift Rev Matching blips the throttle to ready theengine for the new gear. It gives you the power of expert performancedriving by delivering smoother, quicker downshifts for increasedstability and more consistent engine power.
adjust damping forcesbased on road conditions to maintain the perfect ride and preciseresponse that suits all your moments behind the wheel.

A performance car speaks to youthrough its exhaust, and the specialty exhaust tuning on theQ60 Convertible and Coupe shapes that sound into somethinguniquely compelling. Not only does it make an Infiniti unmistakable,it makes every trip up and down the tachometer an experiencethat transcends engineering and enters the realm of pure emotion.

Dynamic handling is built rightinto the foundation of the Q60 Convertible and Coupe, thanksto its Front-Midship Platform. Placing the engine’s center ofmass just behind the front wheel center line creates a near-equalfront-to-rear weight ratio, with a slight front bias that you’ll feelas quicker turn-in and even balance as you accelerate out of acorner.

The Infiniti ethos is all about being forward-thinking, innovative, passionate and original. So if you share our philosophy and drive – and have the desire, expertise and curiosity to join a company that refuses to conform – you may be interested in one of our vacant positions.

 

 

As well as a desire to become part of a company that’s unrestricted by rules and conventions, you will need to be English-speaking with an international profile.

 

 

With headquarters in Switzerland, we aim to recruit sales forces in individual countries and are looking for people capable of bringing our exclusive brand experience to life as we continue to create ever more inspirational vehicles.

 

 

Enquiries will be treated in strictest confidence.
THE FUTURE OF PERFORMANCE MOTORING COULD BE IN YOUR HANDS
Unfortunately, there are currently no positions available with Infiniti Europe. However, please do check again soon.
Electronic Brake Force Distribution adjusts the amount of brake force applied to the front and rear wheels, improving performance and diminishing body motion.

Intelligent Cruise Control (ICC) helps you look ahead and intuitively slows you down when traffic in front of you slows down. When the way is clear, it automatically accelerates back to your desired speed. For less effort, more ease.
Ultra high-strength steel, used in areas critical to preserving your safety, offers more than twice the tensile strength of conventional steel, for added resiliency and lighter weight.

When reversing, the RearView Monitor displays coloured guidelines to give you an accurate sense of how close you are to objects behind you, and adjusts as you turn to show your path — so you're always in control.
Electronic Brake Force Distribution adjusts the amount of brake force applied to the front and rear wheels, improving performance and diminishing body motion.

Intelligent Cruise Control (ICC) helps you look ahead and intuitively slows you down when traffic in front of you slows down. When the way is clear, it automatically accelerates back to your desired speed. For less effort, more ease.
Ultra high-strength steel, used in areas critical to preserving your safety, offers more than twice the tensile strength of conventional steel, for added resiliency and lighter weight.

When reversing, the RearView Monitor displays coloured guidelines to give you an accurate sense of how close you are to objects behind you, and adjusts as you turn to show your path — so you're always in control.

The 3.7-litre V6 combines visionary technology and dynamic thrust to reshape how movement is felt. It’s a revelation in acceleration. From the first moment of movement, you know everything has changed. The visceral intensity of its hard-charging, class-leading 329-hp is transformed by the rushing wave of acceleration swell that makes performance feel as effortless as it does limitless. It’s an experience brought to life by exclusive VVEL technology that continually adjusts intake valve lift and timing, delivering a quicker response and a broader torque curve, even while improving economy and emissions. Advanced technologies continuously monitor your surroundings for added peace mind on every journey.

Infiniti Intelligent Key customises your driving experience without ever leaving your pocket or purse. Everything from your seat position, to navigation, climate and audio preferences, to performance and steering settings will be automatically set for you as you approach the Infiniti Q60.

Our Infiniti Bose® Premium Sound System envelops you, creating depth and ambience for a wider, more immersive sound. With 13 speakers specially arranged inside your Q60 Coupé, sound washes through the cabin for greater audio entertainment.

The Advanced Climate Control System actively cleans the air inside the cabin and removes up to 99.5% of allergens. It will also sense outside fumes and automatically close the vents, meaning your air and interior stay fresh.
The Infiniti Hard Drive Navigation System features an elevated and realistic Birdview™ perspective with 3D building graphics to help you easily reach your destination.
With advanced technologies, Infiniti InSuite™ anticipates your needs, simplifies tasks and allows you to enjoy the ride in complete comfort.
With advanced technologies, Infiniti InSuite™ anticipates your needs, simplifies tasks and allows you to enjoy the ride in complete comfort.

Infiniti Intelligent Key customises your driving experience without ever leaving your pocket or purse. Everything from your seat position, to navigation, climate and audio preferences, to performance and steering settings will be automatically set for you as you approach the Infiniti Q60.

Our Infiniti Bose® Premium Sound System envelops you, creating depth and ambience for a wider, more immersive sound. With 13 speakers specially arranged inside your Q60 Coupé, sound washes through the cabin for greater audio entertainment.
Infiniti Q60 Coupe Bose® Premium Sound System

The Advanced Climate Control System actively cleans the air inside the cabin and removes up to 99.5% of allergens. It will also sense outside fumes and automatically close the vents, meaning your air and interior stay fresh.
The Infiniti Hard Drive Navigation System features an elevated and realistic Birdview™ perspective to help you easily reach your destination.

Around View® Monitor with Moving Object Detection and Front and Rear Sonar takes the effort out of parking. The systems work together to produce a simulated 360° bird’s eye view to give you a better perspective of what’s around you.
The LED Bi-Xenon headlights do more than impress – they extend your ability to see more by shedding light in the direction of your turn thanks to the Adaptive Front lighting System (AFS).
The magnetic new exterior features flowing contours and a unique front fascia.

Lane Departure Prevention (LDP) warns if it detects you drifting from your lane. If the drift continues, it lightly applies selected brakes to help ease you back. But you never give up control as it’s designed to assist, not override.

Back-Up Collision Intervention increases your awareness and ability to react. As you reverse, the system warns you if an object is detected behind your vehicle and can help you avoid a collision by applying the brakes.

Featuring state-of-the-art safety systems including curtain side impact air bags, load limiters and pretensioners in the front seat belts, and a reinforced passenger compartment made of ultra-high strength steel, the Infiniti Q70 is built to keep you and your passengers safe.

The Blind Spot Intervention™ System detects vehicles entering the blind spot area in an adjacent lane to help you avoid it. First, a warning light illuminates. then, if you begin moving toward the occupied lane, a warning sounds. The system will even apply opposite side brakes to help guide the Infiniti Q70 back to the centre of your current lane.

PREDICTIVE FORWARD COLLISION WARNING (FCW) scans ahead, even monitoring the vehicle that’s ahead of the one in front of you, to help warn you of potential danger and give you a better chance of avoiding a collision.

Predictive Forward Collision Warning (FCW) scans up to two vehicles in front of you. It warns you of potential danger that may be obscured from view, anticipates the need to respond and helps to avoid a collision altogether.
With advanced technologies, Infiniti InSuite™ anticipates your needs, simplifies tasks and allows you to enjoy the ride in complete comfort.

The Bose® Premium Surround Sound System  boasts 16 speakers, including 4 which have been mounted on the shoulders of the front seats. Each one is custom-tuned to deliver rich and realistic 5.1 surround sound imaging for greater entertainment for the driver and passengers.
The BOSE® PREMIUM SURROUND SOUND SYSTEM

Dual zone adaptive climate controlled front-seats surround you in greater comfort by pushing cool or warm air through the front seats to keep you entirely in your preferred temperature zone. Arrive at your destination refreshed and relaxed.
Welcome Lighting elegantly draws you into the driving experience. It lights your way as your approach and acknowledges your presence by illuminating the interior.

Active Noise Control (ANC) offers peaceful solace from the outside world. Intelligent technology detects road or wind noise and neutralises it with opposing sound waves for a more serene driving experience.
Chase the infinite possibilities of the sky above you, the pavement below you and the passion within.

Exciting response with intelligent efficiency. Benefitting from Variable Valve Event and Lift technology (VVEL®), this 3.7L V6 petrol engine delivers a stirring 235 kW (320 PS) while making most of every drop of fuel to achieve up to XX L/100km.
Your abilities amplified, your senses intensified. This is driving in the moment, where you’re free to unleash the potential in every second.

A potent blend of exciting response andintelligent efficiency. Benefitting from Variable Valve Event andLift (VVEL) technology, the engine adjusts on the fly to makethe most of every bit of fuel and every breath it takes. The resultis a stirring 329 horsepower that still manages to achieve upto 8.7l/100km*.

Not only does it make an Infiniti unmistakable,it makes every trip up and down the tachometer an experiencethat transcends engineering and enters the realm of pure emotion.

When you flick the magnesium paddle shifter for alower gear, Downshift Rev Matching blips the throttle to ready theengine for the new gear. It gives you the power of expert performancedriving by delivering smoother, quicker downshifts for increasedstability and more consistent engine power.

Dynamic handling is built rightinto the foundation of the Q60 Convertible and Coupe, thanksto its Front-Midship Platform. Placing the engine’s center ofmass just behind the front wheel center line creates a near-equalfront-to-rear weight ratio, with a slight front bias that you’ll feelas quicker turn-in and even balance as you accelerate out of acorner.
Infiniti Q60 Cabriolet Adaptive Front Lighting System
The LED Bi-Xenon headlights do more than impress – they extend your ability to see more by shedding light in the direction of your turn thanks to the Adaptive Front lighting System (AFS).

The breathtaking power of the class-leading 328-hp V6 engine is crafted to feel like a peaking wave rather than a short-lived burst, creating the sensation of limitless power as you accelerate. The feeling is enhanced by Variable Valve Event and Lift (VVEL) technology that improves performance and fuel efficiency.
Advanced technologies continuously monitor your surroundings for added peace of mind on every journey.

Intelligent Cruise Control (ICC) helps you look ahead and intuitively slows you down when traffic in front of you slows down. When the way is clear, it automatically accelerates back to your desired speed. Less effort, more ease.
With advanced technologies, Infiniti InSuite™ anticipates your needs, simplifies tasks and allows you to enjoy the ride in complete comfort.

The Infiniti Bose® Premium Sound System dynamically adjusts volume and equalisation for outstanding depth and clarity, top up or top down, while headrest-mounted speakers make every note sound as though it was played just for you.
Climate controlled front- seats surround you in greater comfort by pushing cool or warm air through to keep you in your preferred temperature zone. Arrive at your destination refreshed and relaxed.

Infiniti Intelligent Key customises your driving experience without ever leaving your pocket or purse. Everything from your seat position, to navigation, climate and audio preferences, to performance and steering settings will be automatically set for you as you approach your Infiniti Q60.
The Adaptive Climate Control System automatically adjusts to maintain a comfortable environment based on the convertible's hood position, ambient temperature and speed of the wind flowing by.
The Infiniti Hard Drive Navigation System features an elevated and realistic Birdview™ perspective with 3D building graphics to help you easily reach your destination.
If you would like to receive the latest news and exclusive offers, sign up for Infiniti World– The Infiniti eNewsletter.
